original_text: The Israelites may listen to what you say, or they may not listen. They do not want to obey me. But they will know that I have sent a prophet to them.
korean_text: 그들은 패역한 족속이라 그들이 듣든지 아니 듣든지 그들 가운데에 선지자가 있음을 알지니라

sentences.original_text: The Israelites may listen to what you say
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 백성이 네가 말하는 것을 들을지도 모르고

sentences.original_text: They do not want to obey me
that I have sent a prophet to them
